__e: We knew exactly how far we could go without them thinking we wanted sex.
A lot of Chinese hear these things when we're kids, then we grow up, and pretend not to believe them.
But until today, we held out the same hope about you.
We thought things would settle down. It worsened...
We should have known better. But we didn't.
The one you didn't believe existed.
The powers that be felt that he knew just a little bit too much.
You saw someone else you thought did the shooting?
I came from a world where the people believed that the opposite of war was peace.
We believed they were run by a group of 1 2 whose power was everywhere and nowhere.
I had to make sure that nobody knew so that it could be mine... so that everybody knows that that book is mine!
So they figured the treasure must be somewhere, and they have been here since.
We thought she was trying to contact you to find out if you were okay.
I think they believed that even after she tried to kill us all.
You neglected him and you used him and you didn't believe in his talent.
Most people thought that you wouldn't even get back to playing status this year, didn't they?
So would the boys in the back room. They didn't believe I didn't know where he was.
We believed in for better or worse, not for better or until the road gets rocky.
We believed the worst about him the one time in a million when the worst wasn't actually the truth.
But there were some ofus who followed yourwork and believed whatyou were doing... because we knew there was more out there than theywere telling us.
